 14#ifndef VSIP_OPT_EXPR_EVAL_MDIM_HPP
 15#define VSIP_OPT_EXPR_EVAL_MDIM_HPP

 21#include <vsip/opt/expr/assign_fwd.hpp>

 23namespace vsip

 25namespace impl

 27
 28/// Expression reduction to determine if an expression contains
 29/// difficult blocks to handle, such as Rbo blocks.
 30struct Reduce_is_expr_difficult
 31{
 32public:
 33  template <typename BlockT>
 34  struct leaf_node
 35  {
 36    typedef Bool_type<false> type;
 37  };
 38
 39  template <typename BlockT>
 40  struct transform
 41  {
 42    typedef typename leaf_node<BlockT>::type type;
 43  };
 44
 45  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
 46  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
 47  {
 48    typedef typename transform<B>::type type;
 49  };
 50
 51  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
 52  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, false> const>
 53  {
 54    typedef Bool_type<true> type;
 55  };
 56
 57  template <dimension_type                Dim0,
 58	    typename                      LBlock,
 59	    typename                      RBlock>
 60  struct transform<expr::Vmmul<Dim0, LBlock, RBlock> const>
 61  {
 62//    typedef Bool_type<true> type;
 63    typedef Bool_type<transform<LBlock>::type::value ||
 64                      transform<RBlock>::type::value> type;
 65  };
 66
 67  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
 68	    typename                      LBlock,
 69	    typename                      RBlock>
 70  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
 71  {
 72    typedef Bool_type<transform<LBlock>::type::value ||
 73                      transform<RBlock>::type::value> type;
 74  };
 75
 76  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
 77	    typename                      Block1,
 78	    typename                      Block2,
 79	    typename                      Block3>
 80  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
 81  {
 82    typedef Bool_type<transform<Block1>::type::value ||
 83                      transform<Block2>::type::value ||
 84                      transform<Block2>::type::value> type;
 85  };
 86};
 87
 88
 89
 90// Reduction to extract a 1-dimensional subview from an expression
 91// with n-dimensional (where n > 1), taking care to push subview
 92// as "deep" as possible so that library evaluators can still be
 93// applied.
 94
 95template <dimension_type FixedDim>
 96class Subdim_expr
 97{
 98public:
 99  template <typename BlockT>
100  struct leaf_node
101  {
102    typedef Sliced_block<BlockT, FixedDim> type;
103  };
104
105  template <dimension_type Dim,
106	    typename       T>
107  struct leaf_node<expr::Scalar<Dim, T> >
108  {
109    typedef expr::Scalar<1, T> type;
110  };
111
112  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
113  struct unary_node
114  {
115    typedef expr::Unary<O, B, true> const type;
116  };
117
118  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
119	    typename LBlock,
120	    typename RBlock>
121  struct binary_node
122  {
123    typedef expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const type;
124  };
125
126  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
127	    typename Block1,
128	    typename Block2,
129	    typename Block3>
130  struct ternary_node
131  {
132    typedef expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const type;
133  };
134
135  template <typename BlockT>
136  struct transform
137  {
138    typedef typename leaf_node<BlockT>::type type;
139  };
140
141  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
142  struct transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
143  {
144    typedef typename unary_node<O, typename transform<B>::type>::type type;
145  };
146
147  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
148	    typename LBlock,
149	    typename RBlock>
150  struct transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>
151  {
152    typedef typename binary_node<Operation,
153				 typename transform<LBlock>::type,
154				 typename transform<RBlock>::type>
155    ::type type;
156  };
157
158  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
159	    typename Block1,
160	    typename Block2,
161	    typename Block3>
162  struct transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>
163  {
164    typedef typename ternary_node<Operation,
165				  typename transform<Block1>::type,
166				  typename transform<Block2>::type,
167				  typename transform<Block3>::type>
168    ::type type;
169  };
170
171
172  template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
173  typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
174  apply(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &b)
175  {
176    typedef typename transform<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>::type
177      block_type;
178    return block_type(b.operation(), apply(const_cast<B&>(b.arg())));
179  }
180
181  template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
182	    typename LBlock,
183	    typename RBlock>
184  typename transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
185  apply(expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const& blk)
186  {
187    typedef typename
188      transform<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> const>::type
189        block_type;
190    return block_type(apply(const_cast<LBlock&>(blk.arg1())),
191		      apply(const_cast<RBlock&>(blk.arg2())));
192  }
193
194  template <template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
195	    typename Block1,
196	    typename Block2,
197	    typename Block3>
198  typename transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
199  apply(expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const& blk)
200  {
201    typedef typename
202      transform<expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, true> const>::type
203        block_type;
204    return block_type(apply(const_cast<Block1&>(blk.arg1())),
205		      apply(const_cast<Block2&>(blk.arg2())),
206		      apply(const_cast<Block3&>(blk.arg3())));
207  }
208
209  // Leaf combine function for expr::Scalar.
210  template <dimension_type Dim,
211	    typename       T>
212  typename transform<expr::Scalar<Dim, T> >::type
213  apply(expr::Scalar<Dim, T>& block) const
214  {
215    typedef typename transform<expr::Scalar<Dim, T> >::type type;
216    return type(block.value());
217  }
218
219
220  // Leaf combine function.
221  template <typename BlockT>
222  typename transform<BlockT>::type
223  apply(BlockT& block) const
224  {
225    typedef typename transform<BlockT>::type block_type;
226    return block_type(block, idx_);
227  }
228
229  // Constructors.
230public:
231  Subdim_expr(index_type idx) : idx_(idx) {}
232
233  index_type idx_;
234};
235
236} // namespace vsip::impl
237} // namespace vsip
238
239namespace vsip_csl
240{
241namespace dispatcher
242{
243
244/// Evaluator to convert multi-dimensional expressions into multiple 1
245/// dimensional expressions.  Intended to handle non-dense multi-dim
246/// expressions that cannot be handled by Dense_expr_tag.
247template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
248struct Evaluator<op::assign<2>, be::mdim_expr, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
249{
250  static char const *name() { return "Expr_Mdim<2>";}
251
252  static bool const ct_valid =
253    !impl::Reduce_is_expr_difficult::template transform<RHS const>::type::value;
254
255  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
256
257  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<LHS>::order_type order_type;
258  static dimension_type const fixed_dim = 0;
259
260  typedef typename impl::Proper_type_of<RHS>::type proper_rhs_block_type;
261
262  typedef typename impl::Subdim_expr<fixed_dim>::template
263                   transform<proper_rhs_block_type>::type
264    new_rhs_type;
265  typedef typename impl::Subdim_expr<fixed_dim>::template transform<LHS>::type
266    new_lhs_type;
267
268  static new_lhs_type diag_helper_dst(LHS &lhs)
269  {
270    impl::Subdim_expr<fixed_dim> reduce(0);
271    typename impl::View_block_storage<new_lhs_type>::plain_type
272      new_lhs = reduce.apply(lhs);
273    return new_lhs;
274  }
275
276  static new_rhs_type diag_helper_src(RHS const &rhs)
277  {
278    impl::Subdim_expr<fixed_dim> reduce(0);
279    typename impl::View_block_storage<new_rhs_type>::plain_type
280      new_rhs = reduce.apply(const_cast<RHS&>(rhs));
281    return new_rhs;
282  }
283
284  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
285  {
286    for (index_type r=0; r<lhs.size(2, fixed_dim); ++r)
287    {
288      impl::Subdim_expr<fixed_dim> reduce(r);
289      // Create an lvalue that dispatch() below can write into.
290      typename impl::View_block_storage<new_lhs_type>::plain_type
291	new_lhs = reduce.apply(const_cast<LHS&>(lhs));
292
293      vsip_csl::dispatch<op::assign<1>, void, new_lhs_type &, new_rhs_type const &>
294	(new_lhs, reduce.apply(const_cast<proper_rhs_block_type&>(rhs)));
295    }
296  }
297};
298
299} // namespace vsip::impl
300} // namespace vsip
301
302#endif // VSIP_OPT_EXPR_EVAL_MDIM_HPP
